title: Gnarly Skateboard Injuries
name: Gnarly Skateboard Injuries
description:
A Map by Hive

This is the Slam Section of Platial.  To commemorate and celebrate the pain.

properties.name: Bail Onto A Homeade Funbox It HURTS!
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000england

properties.name: Broken Ankle doing frontside boardslide on 3 stair handrail.
properties.description: Posted by Hivesmall Handrails @ NE Grand & Multnomah, Portland, ORSkating by myself, c. 1986/7??, front foot landed in front of my board, thought it was just a tweak. Hopped all the way home, skateboard as crutch. My mom didn\'t let me go to the doctor, too many false alarms in the past. A few days later, we finally went to get a cast.

properties.name: Did a somersault over a picnic table
properties.description: Posted by Baostar2650 Fairview Rd., Costa MesaI ollied down 3-4 steps of stairs onto one of the many picnic tables in their natural positions in the center quad area. You have to be going pretty fast to clear the distance in addition to the height of the table. Unfortunately, my back truck hung up on the table ledge and I went flying into a bad-looking somersault and landed on my butt and back (mostly butt) on table right side, slid a little bit and rolled off the table onto the bench, and then finally reached the ground with my hand and feet. Luckily, I didn\'t broke anything, just a bruised back and butt.

properties.name: Hung up on a Madonna at Richmond Skate Ranch
properties.description: Posted by Jake  I remember skating here with Casey (RIP) and Colin McKay. I hung up on a Madonna, and once again, fell to the flatbottom on my chin, requiring stitches by a Canuckian doctor. Since I had what looked like a synthetic 3 haired beard, I didn\'t get the sympathy from the high school girls.

properties.name: Hung up on a fakie rock, on vert, met a girl.
properties.description: Posted by HiveVert Ramp behind skatechurch intern house, NE 87th & Glisan, Portland, ORFell straigh to the flat on the back of my head. My hair was sticking out of the little holes in the helmet. The only person there was Mary Qwapich, she asked if i was alright, we started dating.

properties.name: Kevin Balls Beavercreek Ramp, where I broke my hand and got a concussion
properties.description: Posted by Jakebeavercreek, orWent and skated here with Mike and Kyle, hung up on a backside air, fell to the flatbottom, got up and almost walked into an electric fence that\'s meant to keep cows inside the farm. Got a concussion even with my Pro-Tec helmet on, broke my hand, and got the war wound and sympathy from the girls in high school.

properties.name: Lipslide in the Big Bowl, Hung Up, Baaad Slam.
properties.description: Posted by Hive Clint Bidleman was down there, I really felt like showing off my frontside lipslides, hung up, face and shoulder slam in the bottom, 10 ft down, no helmet, facial deformation, teeth scraped in gnasty burnside filth!!!

properties.name: Lost my board into the Willamette River
properties.description: Posted by Hive  off the Burnside Bridge, Portland, ORCruising home from a really fun session at Burnside, back to martial ART, on a super sick and gnarly homepressed deck that alex lilly made for me (uncut, just rectangular with crazy overlapping plies mounted on huge kryptos! so sick! favorite board ever maybe), any way, did a little ollie over something, landed in bad wheel bite, took a hipper and nearly a header into the railings, my board starts coasting backwards, slowly, towards the little gap under that rail !! ahhhh, i crawl jump scoot towards it, but toooooo late, it just rolls under the rail and out into the moist air above the murky river. sigh. splash.

properties.name: Mississip
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000neshobasmall towns to skate

properties.name: Really Bad Slam on a Handrail
properties.description: Posted by BaostarBack of Home Depot warehouseMy friend Christian (pictured) was a "fast" and "hardcore" street skater. When ever you go skating with him, you better do a maintenance check on your board because you\'ll be sliding down a freeway bridge, underground mall parking lot, or the damaged sidewalks of Westminster. We were skating through the back of Home Depot one day where there was this long, chest-height, flat-level handrail by the loading area. That\'s when he decided to rail slide it without giving it a second thought. We were traveling pretty fast when he suddenly kicked up his board, grabbed it, and jump up onto the hand rail, but he didn\'t slide far because there were no slant to the hand rail at all. This is where it got bad...his board hung up, came to a halt, and he flew off it and landed on his crotch and busted his nuts on the handrail. I mean his legs didn\'t even touch ground and it has hard. He was home-bound and out of service for two months after that.

properties.name: Slammed into blackberries
properties.description: Posted by Jake This is way back when I used to sit down on my skateboard. I went super fast downhill, then realized I wasn\'t going to make it. So I put my feet down and launched headfirst into some blackberries.

properties.name: Truck bolt pierced into my knee
properties.description: Posted by BaostarHuntington Beach Pier, Huntington BeachI was freestylin\' back in the days with my buddy Mark and other locals. Did a truck to truck transfer with a flip and landed off-balance on the other truck of the skateboard, causing one of the board\'s truck (with 3" bolts) to swung right into my knee cap and pierced into it. Luckily, it penetrated a soft part of my knee - a good inch deep - which I had to pull out before I started bleeding profusely. I still have the scar to this day.

properties.name: Where I bent my knee backwards, all the way!  >:-(
properties.description: Posted by Jason15 Ne Hancock St, Portland, ORI was visiting Portland from NYC, was so stoked on the big bowl, and the my little nephew was now a skater. It was a few days after xmas, and I took him to the park to skate and hang out. I was trying to do a fakie pop drifter over the bowl\'s hip from the deep end to the shallow. The board just kept floating away from me. I gave it one last go, stumbled and landed with my leg fully extended and knee locked (really bad idea). I couldn\'t skate for 3 years after that injury. That was like almost 4 years ago. (the photo is not actually of my own knee)

properties.name: Where my board flew into my neck and gave me a scab beard
properties.description: Posted by Jake539 N Main Ave, gresham, orcirca 1988, I was doing a shuttle or rocket air or something, landed with one foot on the tail to fly into my neck, which caused an awesome rash beard.

properties.name: Wigtown Scotlands Booktown
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000wigtownThis Is Where I Bailed Into A Lampost and Chipped My Elbow Nd Ma Funny Bone ND It Wasnae Funny !

properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000united kingdomsevere head trauma

properties.name: i almost got a cocusin
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000new yorki was sk8ing with my frined i was going down my ramp i wanted to end with a 360 i fell backword & slamed my head

properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000cork

properties.name: this is where i bailed into a lampost again
properties.description: Posted by Bianca2000wigtownbusted up my wrist into lampost
